A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: No spoilers\, but huge plot holes\, bad writing\, and nothing made sense in a story sense or in a reality sense. People who seemed to like it the most were casual fans and new fans. I believe this was made purely for children. All of the questions I wanted answered from previous movies were either ignored or glossed over. Some will disagree\, and to each their own. I love the original trilogy\, didn't care for the prequels\,  liked Force Awakens but HATED this.
